item.description:
You wanted more BYOB venues and here it is

I have not been here but it comes highly recommended!! The food is supposed to be delicious!!

Guilford Bistro and Grille Café is a European-esque café. Painted in sunny colors with bistro tables and funky mismatched chairs, you may think you've gone abroad.
Choose from an eclectic array of delicious entrées, including Italian and seafood dishes and yummy wraps, panini and foccaccia.

Don't forget that bottle of wine, though. [b]This cozy bistro is strictly BYOB.

After dinner we can head down to the water and have drinks at Guilford Moorings

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Guilford Bistro & Grille Cafe - BYOB
